m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR DYNAMIC IN-VEHICLE VIRTUAL REALITY United States Patent Application 20150097863 Kind                 Code: A1 Abstract: A method for in-vehicle dynamic virtual reality, including receiving vehicle data from a portable device, the portable device operably connected for computer communication to an output device, the vehicle data including vehicle dynamics data, and receiving user data from at least one of the portable device or the output device.
